primaryCTA.subheadline: Clarity by day 30 traction by day 60 scale by day 90
primaryCTA.disclaimer: See how your campaigns could perform better

items.question: Why 90 days?
items.answer: 90 days provides enough time to establish baselines, run statistically significant tests, and scale winners while maintaining budget discipline.

items.question: What happens at 30 60 90?
items.answer: Day 30: Performance baseline established. Day 60: Winners identified and optimized. Day 90: Scaled campaigns with documented playbook.

items.question: Do you manage social ads?
items.answer: Yes, through our partnership with North American Advertising, we handle Meta, LinkedIn, and TikTok with rapid creative testing.

items.question: Brand safety and fraud prevention?
items.answer: We implement pre-bid fraud detection, brand safety filters, and viewability standards from day one across all campaigns.
